titleStmt.title: Poems, or, Epigrams, satyrs, elegies, songs and sonnets, upon several persons and occasions
titleStmt.author: Eliot, John.

notesStmt.note: In manuscript on t.p.: The author John Eliot.
Attributed to John Eliot by Wing.
"By no body must know whom, to be had every body knowes where, and for any body knowes what."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
